extendedInfo.description: ***** This is Advance version of Popular Anti Mosquito App *****â¢â¢â¢â¢> It Run in Background.â¢ The ultrasonic Mosquito repellent application emit a very unique high frequency sound (ultra sound) that most mosquitoes find distasteful and prevents you from getting bitten by mosquitoes.â¢ Do you know that only female mosquitoes bite us? Do you also know that mosquitoes stay away from certain sonic frequencies?â¢ The pitch of the sound is so high that most humans will not notice anything.* Mosquito bite can lead to malaria, dengue, fever, hey fever,allergy, chikangunya, repel mosquito, save life.â¢ Green and Non-toxic!this Anti Mosquito app Keep mosquitoes away naturally, avoiding to breathe toxic gas and without environment pollution.â¢ Tips:â¢ Turn up the volume to the highest level for a more effective sound.â¢ Use the Frequency controls to find the optimal repelling frequency for your region.The app does not guarantee a 100% protection as there are over 3500 known mosquito species in the world and they all react slightly different to the repellent. Use the Frequency selector to find optimal repelling frequency for the mosquitoes in your region.get More info about ultra sonic technique: http://www.electroschematics.com/3864/ultrasound-and-insects/FAQ:Q: After I switch on app,why Screen Brightness reduced ?A: Its completely NORMAL, the Brightness is reduced in order to SAVE BATTERY of your device.Q: How ultra sound repels Mosquitoes ?A:The theory is that only Female mosquitoes are able to bite us and once a female mosquito has her eggs fertilized she will actively avoid any further contact with the male. In order to to do this, she can recognize the sound of the vibrations from the wing beat of the male which it is claimed is sufficiently different from a females to enable this to happen â thus, upon recognizing such wingbeats the female is ârepelledâ away so as to avoid any further and now unwanted attentions of the male.Q.: Why i'm hearing an hiss? / Why I don't hear nothing?A.: The app plays an high frequency sound. Some people under 30 years old can hear the sound, while over a certain age (variable from person to person) the ear lose the ability to hear high frequency sounds.Q.: Mosquitoes don't have ears, how do they hear sounds??A.: Insects don't have ears, but on feelers, that are the mosquitoes aural organs, there are about 15.000 sensorial receptors, structured so to create an "active ear" in which natural vibrations are generated so to amplify the incoming sounds. [Source: Le Scienze on-line]Q.: Are you telling me that the phone loudspeaker can play ultrasounds?A.: Actually the frequency used in Anti Mosquito is slightly under the ultrasounds threshold frequency. But it's very close to the limit that can be heard by the human ear (20 kHz), so for the sake of simplicity we called it "ultrasound", because a lot of people can't hear it.Q:why this app need 2 permissions ?A:1.permissions "WRITE_SETTINGS" :WRITE SETTINGS permission is needed to adjust the brightness of the screen in-order to SAVE BATTERY of device.2.permissions INTERNET & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE etc:To display AdMob/revmob ads this permissions are needed.we understand your privacy so we DONT spam, its not in our DNA.

reviews.title: Rename it
reviews.comment: If you just rename this app to \"Test your hearing\" it will be a greatest app ever. You hear a sound from 12 to 16 KHz you are ok. If not, see the doctor... Those who drink our blood hear infrasound,they are not bats ;)
reviews.author: Edis Salihovi\304\207

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Even when mobile is at a distance of 1 ft..there is no effect..mosquitos are not even bothered when the is mobile is near n app is on
reviews.author: naveenkumar10h

reviews.title: This app works great
reviews.comment: I was outside doing some barbecue. And when I remembered I turned on the Zapper. I had it on my knee it first and it worked just fine. I put it on my hip holster and was able to walk around and it works just great. I would recommend this zapp App. It took care of bees, mosquito, nats, flies. This is just a great little app.
reviews.author: Twyla Jones

reviews.title: Attracted
reviews.comment: This darn app Attracted the mosquitos.  There was one that I just couldn\'t get, after I turned it on there were 12.
reviews.author: Danielle Kastens

reviews.comment: It seemed like it repelled a flying insect when my phone was held near it. No Skeeter\'s seem to be hanging around. Could this work this well?
reviews.author: Mike Orenchuk

reviews.title: Not sure what its doing
reviews.comment: Still lots of mosquitoes....but I\'m still trying
reviews.author: luvina bernard

reviews.title: So far, so good
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using the app for a couple of days.. so far, so good! No mosquitoes in my room
reviews.author: jopa2510

reviews.title: What will happen?
reviews.comment: I read the faq and it said that female mosquitos are trying to stay away from males when their eggs are fertilised and bla bla bla... but what about when their eggs aren\'t fertilised, will the females get attracted by the sound? ??
reviews.author: Adrian B\303\244ckman

reviews.title: Great teenager control app!
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work too well against the little bees during our picnic.  But worked well on my teenage daughter!!
reviews.author: Eric Wiley

reviews.title: Works for mosquitos on Croatian coast.
reviews.comment: I have been using this app mostly indoors and the 20000 kHz frequency works for me. Just remember to turn up the volume on your device and be patient for a few minutes for the effect. Also experiment with the frequencies to find the right one for your area.
reviews.author: Kemal Ljumanovic

reviews.comment: Worst app jst making fool of us nt wrkng evn aftr setting frequency
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I just installed and hopefully know it will save me from mosquitos in Pakistan.
reviews.author: Syed Z Noshahi

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It\'s really works.  No more annoying mosquitoes bugging around.  Thanks guys.  Good job!
reviews.author: Charles N.

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: If you read FAQ (link provided) you would come to conclusion that this just dont work. I was stupid enough not to read link provided (i guess link would be removed soon since in essence you can read there that its hoax) but i tested the program.   There was 1 maskito (female) on the wall. Cleaning its self probably after lunch. I started program, came veeeery close to moskito nothing. Than i went trough ALL frequencies and nothing again. Mosquito didnt even stop cleaning.   After that i went to read link
reviews.author: Sasa Cosic

reviews.title: Working effectively...
reviews.comment: This app was proven to be effective when i was bitten by too much mosquitoes and when i turn it on, i felt more comfortable...
reviews.author: Izzah Ahmad

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Mosquitoes are good!!! But the application keeps annoying them and it pushes them away only when they are near the phone... is there any bleutooth earphone for mosquitoes so we can run the application while they put the earphones? A headset will do fine too . Please help... btw the latest discoveries have shown a new technique to kill mosquitoes: you catch one with a forceps then you smack it with a hammer. Trust me, it works 100%.. Question: what would happen if the mosquito was deaf?
reviews.author: Walid Faddoul

reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
reviews.comment: Ive been trying this app since a week ago. So far no mosquito bite on any part of my body. Last night i decided to switch it off to see how it goes. When i woke up this morning, omg!! the mosquito bites are all over my legs n my arms. This app is really good at getting rid of this tiny dracula!! Very usefull.. It is highly recommended guys!! Thumbs up!!
reviews.author: anis mardhiah

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Got rid of mosquitoes BUT some advice to downloaders: children are not at all keen on the sound either so bear that in mind whilst using. My 12 year old cannot stand the sound. It\'s good for when you stand outside to smoke (I have children and don\'t have smoke near my house) Mosqitoes DON\'T LIKE THIS APP! Well done developer.
reviews.author: Lisa Brum

reviews.title: Its great!!!
reviews.comment: It was very helpful. Ive been getting bitten by mosquitos every night when I sleep and because i sleep in the dark its really hard to kill it because I cant see it I can only hear a really annoying buzz in my ear. Im so sick of them because the bites I get itch so bad n swell up especially on my face but when I woke up this morning there were no new bites... Yayy
reviews.author: Naila Choudhury

reviews.title: Trying it out ?
reviews.comment: As soon as I try it out and if it works , I will be giving a good comment.
reviews.author: Connie Cano
